sentence.Network_en: Teachers staged a sit-down protest in front of the president's office.
sentence.Network_cn: 老师们在校长办公室门前举行了一场静坐抗议。

sentence.Network_en: Let's sit down and then you can say what's up.
sentence.Network_cn: 咱们先坐下来，然后你把事情告诉我。

sentence.Network_en: Now sit down and make yourself comfortable. You must be very tired.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在坐下来，让自己舒服些，你一定很累了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: sit under 听说教 sit up and take notice 突然注意 sit up late 深夜不睡 sit up 坐起 sit with 替人照看 sit 就座 sit-down 静坐抗议 sit-downer 静坐.
sisyphus 道义胜利, sit-down 静坐罢工, sisyrinchium 豚鼻花属
ex : the award banquet will a sit-down meal instead of a buffet this year .今年的颁奖典礼晚宴将会由侍者上菜，而非自助式。

list.abs: 初中英语短语大全 ... 1．near the fireplace 在火炉旁 2．sit down 坐下 3．jump up 跳起来.
台湾康轩书局的小学简易教室英文用语 ... Stand up. 站起来。 Sit down. 坐下来。 Put down. 放下。.

entry.def: If you have a sit-down, you sit down and rest for a short time.

example.ex: All he wanted was a cup of tea and a sit-down.
example.tran: 他只求一杯清茶、片刻小憩。

entry.tran: (餐饭)由侍者送上餐桌的，坐在桌前吃的
entry.def: A sit-down meal is served to people sitting at tables.

example.ex: A sit-down dinner was followed by a disco.
example.tran: 晚宴之后播放了一曲迪斯科舞曲。

entry.def: In a sit-down protest, people refuse to leave a place until they get what they want.

example.ex: Teachers staged a sit-down protest in front of the president's office.
example.tran: 老师们在校长办公室门前举行了一场静坐抗议。

means.word_mean: 1. a strike in which workers refuse to leave the workplace until a settlement is reached

auth_sentence.content: Sit Down itself sums up the group's dichotomies.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sit Down itself sums up the group's dichotomies.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sit Down itself sums up the group's dichotomies.

auth_sentence.content: He was ordered to sit down on the street.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was ordered to sit down on the street.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was ordered to sit down on the street.

auth_sentence.content: They carry all your weight when you sit down.
auth_sentence.res_content: They carry all your weight when you sit down.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They carry all your weight when you sit down.
